issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Support all TPC-H queries in benchmark
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11519](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11519). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is a tracking issue for supporting all of the TPC-H queries.

Supporting all of the queries will add a number of features and helps DataFusion become a robust & fast query engine.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11519?focusedCommentId=17332356) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-datafusion/issues/158
